featured.text: “You think she’s getting the best care in the world, but after a while you start to wonder: What is the objective?”
how the ancient Egyptians created such marvelous feats of engineering as the pyramids? (A) concluded (B) wondered (C) admitted (D) persuaded 5.
I wonder why she turned up the radio when I was studying.
You need not wonder any longer.

other.text: And there are plenty of models from which to choose: from simple $200 point-and-shoot snappers to $1,000 wonders with all the features that any advanced amateur could want.
This common 31 is a wonder of simplicity and function.
A team of scientists, teachers, and students, the AmazonQuest team, recently explored some of the wonders of the Amazon Rainforest.

definition.en_def: A feeling of amazement and admiration, often mixed with curiosity.
definition.example: The children looked at the stars in wonder.
